_sText:
ESCAPE STROGGOS BETA 4

by 

HoLyZomBie


a LITTLE STORY:

After the war against strogg, humans construct a Research Facility Complex on Planet STROGGOS. The Scientists in this Researh Facility Complex have important informations about stroggs and planet stroggos. 2 years after war stroggs attacking again. But... This time they attacking to the Research Facility Complex. We must survive and escape from the Complex with Stroggos-Complex-Train.

------------------------------------
------------------------------------

INFORMATIONS ABOUT THE MAP:

-Custom Textures ( Quake 4 Texs )
-Custom Sounds
-Cubemap
-HDR
-Radar
-Commands
-Special Weapons
-1 Secret

PS: I recommended you to play this map with HDR. With LDR its a bit dark :))

------------------------------------
------------------------------------

SPECIAL WEAPONS:

PushGun: Zombies cannot touch you if you have this gun. Can used only one time and only 15 seconds.

LaserGun: Its LaserGun. Oh really? xD With this gun you can kill a zombie more faster. It can be used only one time and only 15 seconds again. 

------------------------------------
------------------------------------

My System:
- Windows XP Pro SP3
- Intel Core Duo E5200 2.5 Ghz
- 2 GB of RAM
- ATI HD3650 1 gb Graphic Card

------------------------------------
------------------------------------

FPS RATES:
1280x1024 Resolution - All Options High/Enabled - Multicore Rendering & Motion Blur Disabled - AA Disabled - Filter Triliniar

FPS with HDR: 80-150

FPS without HDR: 130-200

------------------------------------
------------------------------------

TEXTURES:
Textures are from the game Quake 4. Textures adapted to css by me.

MUSICS:
musics recommended by canowaR.!?:
Author of the mucis is Brand X Music

Brand x Music - Spawn
Brand X Music - Fanfare Fantastic

------------------------------------

COMPILE INFOS:

Vvis: Full
HDR: yes
Cubemap: Built
Construct Time: 1 month
Compile Time: average 10 Minutes
